tasks.label: Start backend server
args: cd backend; $env:NODE_ENV='development'; if (Test-Path package.json) { if (-Not (Test-Path node_modules)) { npm install }; if (Get-Command npm -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue) { npm run start } else { node app.js } } else { node app.js }

args: Set-Location -Path 'c:\Users\My PC\Desktop\ITP\equiment-rental\mern\backend'; if (-Not (Test-Path 'node_modules')) { npm install }; if (Test-Path 'package.json') { npm run start } else { node app.js }

tasks.label: Restart backend server (dev)
args: if (Get-Process node -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Where-Object { $_.Path -like '*node*' }) { Get-Process node -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Stop-Process -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue }; Set-Location -Path 'd:\GITHUB\equment-rental\mern\backend'; if (-Not (Test-Path 'node_modules')) { npm install }; if (Test-Path 'package.json') { npx nodemon app.js } else { node app.js }
